mapper.insert: insert into RECYCLEBOX(RECYCLEBOXID, RECYCLEBOXLAT, RECYCLEBOXLONG) VALUES (#{RECYCLEBOXID}, #{RECYCLEBOXLAT}, #{RECYCLEBOXLONG})
mapper.select: select RECYCLEBOXID,RECYCLEBOXLAT,RECYCLEBOXLONG from RECYCLEBOX where RECYCLEBOXLAT between #{RECYCLEBOXLAT}-0.005 and #{RECYCLEBOXLAT}+0.005 and RECYCLEBOXLONG between #{RECYCLEBOXLONG}-0.005 and #{RECYCLEBOXLONG}+0.005
